article_title: U.S. to Give Almost $700 Million in Grants to Improve Patient Care
article_text:
Dozens of hospital groups, health departments, doctor associations and others will get almost $700 million to improve patient care as part of the Obama administration’s initiative to overhaul payment methods for medical providers.

The grants, unveiled Tuesday and funded under the Affordable Care Act, coincide with discussions between Health and Human Services Secretary Sylvia Mathews Burwell and congressional lawmakers on changing...
